apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji portrays a tender kiss between two individuals, with one person's skin tone rendered in a warm medium-light hue.  The iconic Apple design language imbues the figures with a soft, almost plush appearance, highlighted by gentle gradients and subtle specular reflections that suggest closeness and affection.  The smooth, rounded features and delicate portrayal of the embrace convey intimacy and romantic connection, perfect for expressing deep fondness or a sweet sentiment.
